page.title: 03The School in Combwich.
page.content: The school is called{Otterhampton {County Primary School.}Most of the children live in Combwich but some come from other villages by mini-bus. The school has 78 on roll with an age range of 4-11yrs.There are 3 classes and 3 full time teachers.The old school, built 1857, is now the hall and kitchen.There are 3 temporary classrooms and a staff room.There is an outside toilet block.The playground is small but the recently enlarged field gives plenty of room for sports. The school day starts at 9:00am and finishes at 3:15pm.Some children have school dinners,some sandwiches.There is a part time school assistant, secretary and caretaker.The school is on high ground giving a good view of the Quantock Hills and Bridgwater Bay. There is a strong association of friends of the school.
